extendedInfo.description: As a Verizon Online Backup and Sharing customer, you can now access your stored data in the cloud wherever you go.Easily view, manage and share your files with anyone using your Androidâ¢ device.  Also, the photo sync feature uploads photos you take with your device directly to your Verizon Online Backup and Sharing account.

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work went to talk to a Verizon person spend 30 waiting to get a person and when finally did we talked what is wrong and stayed they will email in a week to tell me what is wrong. It\'s been a month now and still no email\tDoesn\'t work. No one will help
reviews.author: Jesse Leingang

reviews.title: Re: Phone cloud storage/backup setup.
reviews.comment: yup i have been on Liveperson chat with a helper (obviously in some CRAP godforsaken country) who didn\'t know diddli squat but just wasted my time like at least 40 min. & I am still not getting anything backed up. Why don\'t they have tech knowledgeable people from the USA doing it & stop using slave paid labor from God knows what crap country?? Then I uploaded VZ Backup but it won\'t let me sign on with my user name & pass & say it\'s invalid.
reviews.author: Olga Hasan

reviews.title: SUCKS!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Claims user I\'d is wrong but I CAN log I to website so this POS appt is wrong.  VZW cust service zero help... lost 200 pics because vzw went from pix place to this POS and never warned their cust.  Got text saying log into pix place to save old pixs... and vzw deleted it all on same day as text. F-u vzw!!!
reviews.author: beth travis king henk

reviews.title: Cannot log in
reviews.comment: From all the reviews I have been reading going back for months and the app still doesn\'t work.   It says incorrect username or password.   I\'ll just stick with Dropbox and Sugarsync.  They work and I get more space that is free.  Sorry guys. Cool phone, fast network, crappy app.
reviews.author: Tim Biles

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: So I got the 25gb but can\'t get into the app.  Big rip off
reviews.author: Brandon Moore

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: After reading the bad reviews I decided to try anyway because my pos Verizon phone\'s charging port is broken and they can\'t fix it. The app says my username and password are invalid. How does Verizon not have this down?? Unreal. Get it together Verizon. One more year and I\'m finally done with you!!
reviews.author: Briana Post

reviews.title: SHOCKING HOW VERIZON ALLOWED THIS APP TO GO PUBLIC!
reviews.comment: Awful. Can\'t log in. How can Verizon develop horrible app? Unbelievable. Uninstall.
reviews.author: Richard Barrett-Cuetara

reviews.title: Me too
reviews.comment: I can\'t login either. Why haven\'t they fixed this?
reviews.author: Becky MacKinnon

reviews.title: If possible, i\'d give zero stars
reviews.comment: I can log on and use on my iPhone, but this app on my Samsung tablet won\'t even let me log in.  What\'s up Verizon?
reviews.author: Garry Cook

reviews.title: I can\'t even log in
reviews.comment: Can\'t even login to see if it works.
reviews.author: Dezerrae Sanchez

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: I cant even log in like really

reviews.title: What a hunk of crap
reviews.comment: Can\'t login and can\'t get good LOCAL support

reviews.title: Its for fios customers
reviews.comment: Needs better settings. Can login. It logs into your fios account.  Need settings to stop upload on dataplan and do wifi only

reviews.title: Can\'t log into it.
reviews.comment: Cannot log into the app nn either phone or tablet.
reviews.author: Justin Cook

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: Very poor app and I can\'t even log in SMH!!!
reviews.author: Travis Slade

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: I have been trying to log into this app for two days, and o know I am using the correct information because I looked it up and logged in with the same information.
reviews.author: Shanna H

reviews.title: Too bad
reviews.comment: Well I have been in online chat w/verizon trying to set this up and it is a no go on my phone too. I told her that someone had better check out their reviews. Glad I chose the free storage and didn\'t pay anything
reviews.author: Denise Peterman

reviews.title: someone please help a girl out
reviews.comment: and tell me why I can not sign in to my Verizon backup assistant application? it won\'t accept my pin.  what should I do?  and the other one isn\'t compatible with my phone.
reviews.author: Brae Vance

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Cannot log in. Uninstalled and reinstalled, just keep getting PW/UN error. Based on the dates of other reviews, it doesn\'t seem that Verizon cares.
